title: fluid.pitch~
description: `fluid.pitch~` is a monophonic pitch descriptor that computes both the fundamental frequency and a confidence score from an audio input. It offers various algorithms, including Cepstrum, Harmonic Product Spectrum, and YinFFT, and allows for parameter adjustments like minimum/maximum frequency and FFT settings. This object is useful for controlling other effects based on pitch confidence or for robust pitch tracking in noisy environments.
